TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit PageAsyncTask extends System.Object

summary.span: 包含註冊到網頁之非同步工作的資訊。

span.span: Contains information about an asynchronous task registered to a page.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 2.0 版可讓您註冊多個工作的頁面和之前頁面的呈現以非同步方式執行。ASP.NET version 2.0 allows you to register multiple tasks to a page and run them asynchronously prior to rendering the page. 您可以指定是否緩慢的程序，而且不想讓其他處理程序執行時，這會因工作會以非同步方式執行。You might specify that a task be run asynchronously if it is a slow process and you do not want other processes to be tied up while it is executing. 以平行方式或依序執行的非同步工作。The asynchronous tasks can be executed in parallel or sequentially. A物件必須透過網頁註冊方法。A object must be registered to the page through the method. 若要以非同步方式處理執行非同步工作沒有頁面本身。The page itself does not have to be processed asynchronously to execute asynchronous tasks. 您可以設定`Async`屬性設為 `true` （如下列程式碼範例所示） 或`false`頁面上指示詞和非同步工作會仍會以非同步方式處理：You can set the `Async` attribute to either `true` (as shown in the following code example) or `false` on the page directive and the asynchronous tasks will still be processed asynchronously: `<%@ Page Async="true" %>` 當`Async`屬性設為`false`，執行頁面的執行緒會封鎖，直到所有的非同步工作完成為止。When the `Async` attribute is set to `false`, the thread that executes the page will be blocked until all asynchronous tasks are complete. 註冊任何非同步工作，才能事件將會自動由頁面時執行它們已經尚未執行。Any asynchronous tasks registered before the event will be executed automatically by the page if they have not already been executed. 這些非同步工作註冊之後必須明確地透過執行事件方法。Those asynchronous tasks registered after the event must be executed explicitly through the method. 方法也可用來啟動工作，再事件。The method can also be used to start tasks before the event. 尚未執行的頁面上執行所有已註冊的非同步工作的方法。The method executes all the registered asynchronous tasks on the page that have not been executed. 根據預設，非同步工作會逾時如果未在 45 秒內完成。By default, an asynchronous task will time out if it has not completed within 45 seconds. 您可以在 Web.config 檔或 page 指示詞中指定不同的逾時值。You can specify a different time-out value in either the Web.config file or the page directive. `` Web.config 檔案區段包含`asyncTimeout`屬性，如下所示。The `` section of the Web.config file contains an `asyncTimeout` attribute, as shown below. `` `` `` `` 頁面指示詞包含`AsyncTimeout`屬性。The page directive contains an `AsyncTimeout` attribute. `<%@ Page AsyncTimeout="30" %>` ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會註冊至頁面的三個非同步工作，並以平行方式執行。The following code example registers three asynchronous tasks to a page and executes them in parallel. 每個工作都會呼叫的方法，只會造成執行緒睡眠 5 秒鐘。Each task calls a method that merely causes the thread to sleep for 5 seconds. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.PageAsyncTask#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.PageAsyncTask/CS/page_asynctask.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.PageAsyncTask#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.PageAsyncTask/VB/page_asynctask.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.PageAsyncTask#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.PageAsyncTask/CS/App_Code/SlowTask.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.PageAsyncTask#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.PageAsyncTask/VB/App_Code/SlowTask.vb#2)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: An event handler.

summary.span: 使用可取消工作的事件處理常式，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using an event handler that enables the task to be canceled.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式會包裝委派以便物件可以整合非同步程式碼 (根據物件) 與現有的 ASP.NET Web Form 非同步頁面功能。This constructor wraps a delegate so that the object can integrate asynchronous code (based on objects) with the existing ASP.NET Web Forms asynchronous pages feature. 表示 ASP.NET 將傳遞至物件委派有無取消情形根據屬性中設定`@ Page`網頁指示詞。ASP.NET will signal the object that is passed to a delegate for cancellation based on the attribute set in the `@ Page` directive of the Web page. 當值已達到，物件將會收到信號。When the value has been reached, the object will be signaled. `CancellationToken`參數必須傳遞至您的實作會呼叫任何非同步 Api類別。The `CancellationToken` parameter must be passed to any asynchronous APIs that are called by your implementation of the class.

.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Func`1<class System.Threading.Tasks.Task> handler) cil managed

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這項實作建構函式設定屬性`false`以便與頁面上的其他工作平行處理時，非同步工作。This implementation of the constructor sets the property to `false` so the asynchronous task is not processed in parallel with other tasks on the page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式的實作可讓您設定是否會與頁面上的其他工作平行處理非同步工作。This implementation of the constructor allows you to set whether the asynchronous task will be processed in parallel with other tasks on the page. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立三個非同步工作會處理以平行方式彼此。The following code example creates three asynchronous tasks that are processed in parallel to each other. 這個範例是在中找到之較大範例的一部分類別概觀。This example is part of a larger example found in the class overview. remarks.format: ## Remarks 委派設定於建構函式。The delegate is set in the constructor. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會註冊至頁面的三個非同步工作，並以平行方式執行。The following code example registers three asynchronous tasks to a page and executes them in parallel. 每個工作都會呼叫的方法，只會造成執行緒睡眠 5 秒鐘。Each task calls a method that merely causes the thread to sleep for 5 seconds. A委派指定的每個工作。A delegate is specified for each task. remarks.format: ## Remarks 委派設定於建構函式。The delegate is set in the constructor. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會註冊至頁面的三個非同步工作，並以平行方式執行。The following code example registers three asynchronous tasks to a page and executes them in parallel. 每個工作都會呼叫的方法，只會造成執行緒睡眠 5 秒鐘。Each task calls a method that merely causes the thread to sleep for 5 seconds. 委派指定的每個工作。An delegate is specified for each task. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.PageAsyncTask#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.PageAsyncTask/CS/page_asynctask.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.PageAsyncTask#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.PageAsyncTask/VB/page_asynctask.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.PageAsyncTask#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.PageAsyncTask/CS/App_Code/SlowTask.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.PageAsyncTask#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.PageAsyncTask/VB/App_Code/SlowTask.vb#2)]

summary.span: 取得值，指出工作是否可以和其他工作平行處理。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the task can be processed in parallel with other tasks.

value.span: 如果工作應該和其他工作平行處理，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the task should be processed in parallel with other tasks; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性設定於建構函式。The property is set in the constructor. 當多個工作都登錄在網頁和屬性設定為`true`，則會同時處理這些工作。When multiple tasks are registered in a page and the property is set to `true`, then those tasks are processed concurrently. 不過，如果屬性設定為`false`，則會依序處理這些工作。However, if the property is set to `false`, then those tasks are processed sequentially. 例如，如果頁面包含兩個非同步工作，每個花費 5 秒才能完成和設為`true`，這兩項工作將在 5 秒內完成。For example, if a page contained two asynchronous tasks that each took 5 seconds to complete and is set to `true`, both tasks will complete in 5 seconds. 如果設`false`這些相同的兩個工作，則第一項工作會在 5 秒內完成，而第二個工作完成第一項工作完成後的 5 秒。If is set to `false` for these same two tasks, then the first task will complete in 5 seconds and the second task will complete 5 seconds after the completion of the first task. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會定義三個非同步工作，每個設定為以平行方式處理。The following code example defines three asynchronous tasks that are each set to be processed in parallel. 這個範例是在中找到之較大範例的一部分類別概觀。This example is part of a larger example found in the class overview. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.PageAsyncTask#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.PageAsyncTask/CS/page_asynctask.aspx#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.PageAsyncTask#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.PageAsyncTask/VB/page_asynctask.aspx#3)]

An that represents the state of the task.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性設定於建構函式，而且無法修改執行非同步工作的期間。The property is set in the constructor and cannot be modified during execution of the asynchronous task. 您可以藉由指派到其各自的唯一字串值來區分在網頁中的非同步工作屬性。You can differentiate asynchronous tasks in a page by assigning unique string values to their respective properties. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立三個非同步工作，並提供唯一值及其屬性。The following code example creates three asynchronous tasks and gives them unique values for their properties. 這個範例是在中找到之較大範例的一部分類別概觀。This example is part of a larger example found in the class overview. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.PageAsyncTask#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.PageAsyncTask/CS/page_asynctask.aspx#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.PageAsyncTask#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.PageAsyncTask/VB/page_asynctask.aspx#3)]

A委派指定的每個工作。A delegate is specified for each task.
